name: Movie 43
description: A series of interconnected short films follows a washed-up producer as he pitches insane story lines featuring some of the biggest stars in Hollywood.
keywords: injecting hot saurce in vagina,defecating on someone,irreverence,female frontal nudity,upskirt

review.author: jpa2005
review.heading: Easy watching, a good laugh if it's your sort of thing. Generally misunderstood
review.reviewBody: Personally find it entertaining. Easy to watch. If you take out the crappy base storyline with the 3 twits it's OK. I don't think people realise the point of this film. It's just a sketch movie. It's not meant to be a masterpiece. Millions of people watch sketches like this on YouTube everyday but may a movie well that's just ridiculous, calm down. It's way better than south park which is just swearing angry kids and sex.
